answers.answer: And drinking juice or whatever and laying on my side does nothing.

Some babies are more active then others, with my first pregnancy my son barely move at all and when I had to drink that drink when you get checked for diabetes, he didn't kick, move, nothing! Every baby is different as long as you're feeling some kinda movement sometimes, I'd say you're fine. Try not to stress yourself out!

If u just started feeling baby move I wouldn't worry about it.  It takes longer for some people to feel baby consistently depending on placenta location and baby location.  Withen the next couple of weeks baby will be keeping u awake with mouvement :)
Sometimes I don't know if I am feeling baby or digestion or what. It is frustrating and stressful. Thank you for your comments

question: I am going to be 23 weeks tomorrow. I only feel my baby move a few times a day and it worries me. Just two days ago I started to feel kicks but I've only noticed it twice so far. Is this normal? I see girls on here saying their baby is moving constantly and it worries me that mine isn't. :-( Help!
title: Fetal Movement -Help!
